shows.title: Anthony Wilson
shows.desc:
Join Greenbelt favourite, Anthony Wilson, as he reads from The Afterlife, his fifth collection of poems, and Deck Shoes, a collection of prose memoir, enthusiasms and influences. Anthony’s vividly compassionate work explores how to live fully in the present moment.

Anthony Wilson is a poet, blogger, writing tutor and lecturer. He has published widely including a memoir, Love for Now.

shows.title: The John Peck Lecture: A Tribute to John Smith
shows.desc:
Anthony Wilson reflects on John’s legacy at Greenbelt, placing his work in the tradition of the prophetic imagination. Tracing the connection between his vision and Greenbelt’s, where the arts collide with justice, inclusivity and community and potentially unify us.

Anthony Wilson is a poet, blogger, writing tutor and lecturer. He has published widely including a memoir, Love for Now.
